{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LanReady |model=AP981WX |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/03/2009 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=OEM |type=access point |fcc_id=SCD020056 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2315A |cpu1_cspeed=180 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2315A |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=default |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} "FCC", "FN2A3-H5W Ver: 0.5 (J.L)" ??, and "LanReady Technologies Inc." is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :A label with "Model:F2NA3-H5W" printed on it is affixed to the bottom of the board in the same photos.
The device is using a '''Skyworks''' PA IC.
The FCC test report lists the following models as identical *4ipnet EAP700, EAP701 *Cipherium A700, A701 *USC A700, A701 *Cerio WM-100GX *Pheenet WAP-954GP *PCI CQW-WALLAP *Cenwell CAP-981X, CAP-981WX, CAP-971X, CAP-971WX *LanReady AP981X, AP981WX, AP971X, AP971WX *Wavecore WV-100WA, WV-100CA *Deliberant DLB AP-2W *Ambeon WL54A-WAP
Likely 00:1F:D4 ('''LanReady''') OUI (on FCC sample label)
